org.lafayette.server.mapper
Interface StatementSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseStatementSource
interface StatementSource

Defines a prepared statement with it's parameters.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

Method Summary
 Object[] parameters()
          Returns parameter objects.
 PreparedStatement prepare(Connection db)
          Prepares a statement.
 String sql()
          Returns the statement SQL string.
 

Method Detail

sql

String sql()
Returns the statement SQL string.

Returns:
never null

parameters

Object[] parameters()
Returns parameter objects.

Returns:
never null, maybe empty

prepare

PreparedStatement prepare(Connection db)
                          throws SQLException
Prepares a statement. This method get the SQL and if the parameters are not empty, sets them on the statement.

Parameters:
db - used to get prepared statement
Returns:
never null
Throws:
SQLException - if any SQL syntax error occurs.
